page.title: 03At the Shopping Centre cont.
page.content: They sell chicken,sausage,pancake rolls,cheeseburger and hamburgers, all with chips to take away.They also sell fizzy drinks in cans and sachets of tomato and brown sauce.The library at Brookfield is small and has interesting books,and is a branch of the main Ashford Library.The greengrocer sells fruit of all kinds and vegetables like cabbages,pototoes, peas and carrots.They do not do deliveries. The Doctor's Surgery at Brookfield Court will also check your eye sight and hearing.If you are waiting there are lots of magazines to read,they also relax you with a cup of tea or coffee.The Surgery opens at 8.30am and closes at 10.00am,then reopens at 4.00pm to end at 5.30pm.The Surgery is not open on Wednesdays or Saturdays.
